content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron plates
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plates are required to craft iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
